mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id,sk.user_phone,sk.state,sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id",s.name as "seckill.name",s.number as "seckill.number",s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time",s.create_time as "seckill.create_time" from seckill_success sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id and sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
